name: delivery-system
description: Sistema completo de delivery com PWA e painel administrativo

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../apps/pwa && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:pwa" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: cd apps/pwa && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
